00071 class WXDLLIMPEXP_LIBIRCLIENT wxLIRCCSessionEvent : public wxThreadEvent
00072 {
00073 public:
00080         wxLIRCCSessionEvent(wxEventType commandType = wxEVT_NULL, int id = 0, 
00081                                 wxLIRCCSession* session = 0L )
00082                                 : wxThreadEvent(commandType, id),
00083                                 m_session(session),
00084                                 m_X(0),
00085                                 m_Y(0),
00086                                 m_count(0)
00087         {}
00088 
00093     wxLIRCCSessionEvent(const wxLIRCCSessionEvent& event)
00094                                 : wxThreadEvent(event),
00095                                 m_session(event.m_session),
00096                                 m_X(event.m_X),
00097                                 m_Y(event.m_Y),
00098                                 m_count(event.m_count),
00099                                 m_origin(event.m_origin),
00100                                 m_params(event.m_params)
00101         {}
00102         
00106     virtual wxEvent *Clone() const { return new wxLIRCCSessionEvent(*this); }
00107         
00109     wxLIRCCSession* GetSession() const { return m_session; }
00110         
00112     void SetSession(wxLIRCCSession* session) { m_session = session; }
00113 
00115     int GetX() const { return m_X; }
00116         
00118     void SetX(int x) { m_X = x; }
00119 
00121     int GetY() const { return m_Y; }
00122         
00124     void SetY(int y) { m_Y = y; }
00125         
00127         int GetCount() const {return m_count;};
00128         
00130         void SetCount( int count ) { m_count = count; };
00131         
00133         const wxString& GetOrigin() const {return m_origin;};
00134         
00136         void SetOrigin( const wxString& origin ) {m_origin = origin;};
00137         
00139         const wxArrayString& GetParams() const { return m_params; };
00140         
00142         void SetParams( const wxArrayString& params ) {m_params = params;};
00143 
00144 protected:
00145 
00146     wxLIRCCSession* m_session;
00147 
00148     int m_X;
00149     int m_Y;
00150         
00151         int m_count;
00152         wxString m_origin;
00153         wxArrayString m_params;
00154 
00155 private:
00156     DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxLIRCCSessionEvent)
00157 };

00160 typedef void (wxEvtHandler::*wxLIRCCSessionEventFunction)(wxLIRCCSessionEvent&);
00161 
00162 #define wxLIRCCSessionEventHandler(func) \
00163     (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)wxStaticCastEvent(wxLIRCCSessionEventFunction, &func)
